cause.description:
The summers are getting hotter and hotter, the winters wetter and with more bizarre weather. There are more and more floods and natural disasters, the environment which we inhabit is getting dirtier and dirtier. This is the cause of global warming, global warming is the cause pollution, pollution is the cause of people like you or me........Pick up your trash and make a difference.
1. We need to stop pollutuing.
2. Look into buying a hybrid.
3. Be less energy consuming in your everyday habits.
cause.mission: Our mission is to stop global warming and decrease the amount of trash we throw onto the ground.
cause.name: Stop Polluting! You're Ruining My Snowman!
